title: Which water is soft, tap water or distilled water? - Quora

response.answer_text: Distilled is the softest. R.O. water can also be virtually as soft as distilled. Tap water has many naturally occuring and other things dissolved in it. Mostly, water hardness is caused by the Calcium ions and Magnesium ions. I live in Arizona so the hardness can be increased by a variety of other ions as well, such as Iron and Manganese. If you notice, hardness is almost entirely due to dissolved metal ions.

Why only only think about soft and hard? When it comes to purity there is no comparison on any count. distilled water is 100% sort. Tap water is altogether different in different places. Ashok Rangnekar.
